mapper.insert: insert into t_user_apply_cardrate_trapos_record_info(user_id, sn, credit_card_rate_old, credit_card_rate_new, card_settle_price, cre_date, cre_time,pos_type) select #{map.sys_user_id}, t.sn, t1.credit_card_rate, #{map.credit_card_rate}, t.card_settle_price, #{map.cre_date}, #{map.cre_time}, t.pos_type FROM t_user_traditional_pos_info t LEFT JOIN t_sys_traditional_pos_info t1 on t.sn = t1.sn where t.user_id = #{map.sys_user_id} and t.state_status = '1' and find_in_set(t.sn, #{map.sn_list}) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_user_apply_cardrate_trapos_record_info t2 WHERE t2.user_id = #{map.sys_user_id} AND t2.sn = t.sn AND t2.status = '00' )

insert into t_user_apply_cardrate_mpos_record_info(user_id, sn, credit_card_rate_old, credit_card_rate_new, card_settle_price, cre_date, cre_time) select #{map.sys_user_id}, t.sn, t1.credit_card_rate, #{map.credit_card_rate}, t.card_settle_price, #{map.cre_date}, #{map.cre_time} FROM t_user_mpos_info t LEFT JOIN t_sys_mpos_info t1 on t.sn = t1.sn where t.user_id = #{map.sys_user_id} and t.state_status = '1' and find_in_set(t.sn, #{map.sn_list}) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_user_apply_cardrate_mpos_record_info t2 WHERE t2.user_id = #{map.sys_user_id} AND t2.sn = t.sn AND t2.status = '00' )
